explanation: The objects that may be involved in completing the task of placing the cool sliced lettuce in front of the toaster are the Plate, Lettuce, and Toaster. The Plate can be used to hold the lettuce slices before placing them in front of the toaster. The Lettuce is the main ingredient that needs to be sliced and placed in front of the toaster. The Toaster is the specific location where the sliced lettuce needs to be placed.
